body.description: Designed for Comfort and Portability. The Wireless Mobile Mouse 1850 is designed for life on the go, offering wireless freedom and built-in transceiver storage for ultimate mobility. Comfortable to use with either hand and a scroll wheel for easy navigation makes this mouse the ideal device for your modern, mobile lifestyle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed For Comfort And Portability The Wireless Mobile Mouse 1850 has a compact design for life on the go, offers wireless freedom and up to 6 months of battery life. Comfortable In Either Hand Comfortable to use with either hand and a scroll wheel for easy navigation makes this mouse the ideal device for your mobile lifestyle. Ultimate Portability When you’re on the go, you can leave the nano transceiver plugged in to your laptop, or stow it in the built-in storage in the mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed at every level
reviews.reviewText: The first thing that struck me was the packaging. I was expecting quality being Microsoft, but it was so inexpensive I was not expecting much more. It was contained in a combo of box and plastic bubble and very easy to open. Instructions with diagrams displayed as soon as you open the box and it is true Plug-n-Play. I can see that the packaging was designed with customer focus.It included a battery and the color is exactly as I expected. The design looks so simple that I thought I would be sacrificing comfort for price. But even with this simple design it fits nicely in my hand. Most important is the tracking. It is solid and on target. Although I have only been using it for a short time, I am beyond pleased and will seek out the Microsoft brand in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tender mouse enough for a snack but not full course dinner.
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse but I noticed that if I am behind a wall it wont work.. But much further line of sight it works. Soooooo.... Why I got this was because the computer was in a different room only separated by a wall and 5 feet away.. But I took the mouse 20 feet away in the same room and it works. This should have worked unlike a infrared type transmitter.. The mouse is almost full size but not quiet which is not a problem for my small hands but would be for the average male hands. Since I have not used it long enough I dont know the battery life and it uses a single 1.5V AA battery. It is not heavy and feels like a normal standard wired mouse most of the time. I was worried about it working on a slow laptop, as when busy the mouse lock would miss but here it still seems to stay stuck when dragging windows and such. Works as well as a wired mouse but not for what I wanted. I will see if I can convert it to a USB mouse.. Since I like the shape and handling..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When looking for a new mouse, some reviews mentioned this one only lasted a couple years. I saw that I had last purchased the same thing in Sept 2018, so I think it's safe to say it lasted much longer. A couple of times I thought it was toast, but it just needed new batteries. I will def buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2019
reviews.reviewText: It feels a little bit cheap but i expected that for the price and it doesn't work well without a mousepad but this was a really good deal and it is extremely cute. Works fine for me. Got it in hot pink for me and in purple for my mom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mouse especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: It's a standard sized mouse in purple. It doesn't get much better.It's got everything you could want in a standard mouse and it even comes with a battery separate from the mouse so you put it in yourself. The USB transmitter also has a place in the battery compartment for storage. The buttons have a very nice feel to them a soft click but not too soft. Especially when you consider the price, I would buy this again if I ever needed another standard mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Wireless Mouse
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this mouse for a couple of weeks now and it is great so far! It fits nicely in my hand and it works on all surfaces that I've tried it on so far. I turned on my laptop on the bed and used it on the sheet and it worked just fine. The color is nice, the scrolling wheel works well, and it has a nice click (kind of on the loud side). I needed a better wireless mouse after an older cheap one died, and this was a great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s great and comfortable not too loud had it a month so far so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable to use, being a durable wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: I actually had (and am still using) this product (identical model number) in a different color for two years. It never broke, never failed me, and I remember changing the batteries only 3~4 times although I used it everyday. I just wanted to buy another one in a different color, so I bought this and I like it. It's equally good and comfortable to use. I also like how it fits my hand very well, but I think I should also mention the fact that my hand is quite small. (My hand slightly covers an iphone6s.) I would recommend this if you have small hands like me or if you like to have a compact wireless mouse.

reviews.reviewTitle: My mom says thank you she likes it
reviews.reviewText: Dog got it and it’s still clicking goodMy mom likes itIt was a for sure upgraded from her vitabram one that was so smallHope this Microsoft mouse lasts for herShe likes to spin slots 🎰 😆

Bought from iBhejo on Amazon for 640 Re.Cool mouse. Product is genuine, checked that.Feels heavy and firm in hand (I like heavy) click is smooth.Pack was a bit dusty and old.Pretty fast delivery.PS: Warranty not applicable in India. one star less for that.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product but stopped working after 7 months of use.
reviews.reviewText: Stopped working after 7 months of use. Could not find any warranty information as well.
Love my purple mouse! It performs all my computer requirements easily.
